description: Creates a billing view with the specified billing view attributes.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the billing view.

parameters.name: sourceViews
parameters.description: A list of billing views used as the data source for the custom billing view. (string) ---

parameters.name: dataFilterExpression
parameters.description: See Expression. Billing view only supports LINKED_ACCOUNT and Tags. dimensions (dict) --- The specific Dimension to use for Expression. The names of the metadata types that you can use to filter and group your results. The metadata values that you can use to filter and group your results. (string) --- tags (dict) --- The specific Tag to use for Expression. The key for the tag. The specific value of the tag. (string) ---

nested_params.name: dimensions
nested_params.description: The specific Dimension to use for Expression.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The names of the metadata types that you can use to filter and group your results.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The metadata values that you can use to filter and group your results.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: The specific Tag to use for Expression.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The specific value of the tag.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier you specify to ensure idempotency of the request. Idempotency ensures that an API request completes no more than one time. If the original request completes successfully, any subsequent retries complete successfully without performing any further actions with an idempotent request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: resourceTags
parameters.description: A list of key value map specifying tags associated to the billing view being created. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. The key that's associated with the tag. value (string) --- The value that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value that's associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the billing view was created.
